languages.text: "Сколь же слепы глаза мон-кай к порокам собственного вида. Люди без причины атаковали корабль детей Азуриана, мирно проплывающий мимо. И при этом винят моих собратьев в трагедии, что настигла их за их же деяния". {n}В голосе эльдарки сквозят презрение и ярость.{/n} "Мои собратья не стали бы участвовать в резне Темных по доброй воле, а потом бросать свой корабль. Здесь... произошло нечто иное. Что-то, о чем я боюсь помыслить".

"How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."
languages.original_text: "Сколь же слепы глаза мон-кай к порокам собственного вида. Люди без причины атаковали корабль детей Азуриана, мирно проплывающий мимо. И при этом винят моих собратьев в трагедии, что настигла их за их же деяния". {n}В голосе эльдарки сквозят презрение и ярость.{/n} "Мои собратья не стали бы участвовать в резне Темных по доброй воле, а потом бросать свой корабль. Здесь... произошло нечто иное. Что-то, о чем я боюсь помыслить".

traits.locale_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attacked a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, and now blame my kinsmen?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "My kind would not willingly participate in butchery of the Dark Ones or abandon their ship by their own volition. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

"How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attacked a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, and now blame my kinsmen?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "My kind would not willingly participate in butchery of the Dark Ones or abandon their ship by their own volition. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

"How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not butcher the Dark Ones of their own volition and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

"How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not butcher the Dark Ones of their own volition and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

"How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

languages.text: “猴子对他们同类的暴行简直是视而不见！阿苏焉子嗣的飞船仅仅是在航行，却遭到了人类的袭击！是人类自己的暴行为他们招致了厄运，可我的族人却要为他们遭遇的灾祸负责？”{n}伊莉耶特无法克制话语中的轻蔑与愤怒。{/n}“不，我的族人绝不会主动杀害那些黑暗子嗣，之后弃船而去。这里恐怕是发生了别的事情，某种我甚至不敢多想的事情。”
languages.original_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

traits.locale_text: “猴子对他们同类的暴行简直是视而不见！阿苏焉子嗣的飞船仅仅是在航行，却遭到了人类的袭击！是人类自己的暴行为他们招致了厄运，可我的族人却要为他们遭遇的灾祸负责？”{n}伊莉耶特无法克制话语中的轻蔑与愤怒。{/n}“不，我的族人绝不会主动杀害那些黑暗子嗣，之后弃船而去。这里恐怕是发生了别的事情，某种我甚至不敢多想的事情。”

languages.text: « À quel point les mon-keigh peuvent-ils être aveugles aux turpitudes de leur propre espèce ? Des humains attaquent un vaisseau des enfants d'Asuryan qui passait paisiblement, mais c'est à mon peuple de porter la responsabilité de la tragédie qui les a frappés suite à cela ? {n}rétorque Yrliet sans cacher sa colère et son mépris.{/n} Non, mes semblables n'auraient pas volontairement pris part à un massacre orchestré par les Drukharis pour ensuite abandonner leur vaisseau. Il s'est passé autre chose ici, une chose que je n'ose même pas envisager. »
languages.original_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

traits.locale_text: « À quel point les mon-keigh peuvent-ils être aveugles aux turpitudes de leur propre espèce ? Des humains attaquent un vaisseau des enfants d'Asuryan qui passait paisiblement, mais c'est à mon peuple de porter la responsabilité de la tragédie qui les a frappés suite à cela ? {n}rétorque Yrliet sans cacher sa colère et son mépris.{/n} Non, mes semblables n'auraient pas volontairement pris part à un massacre orchestré par les Drukharis pour ensuite abandonner leur vaisseau. Il s'est passé autre chose ici, une chose que je n'ose même pas envisager. »

languages.text: "Wie blind Chem-Pan-Sey doch für die Laster ihrer eigenen Art sind. Menschen greifen ein friedlich vorbeifliegendes Schiff der Kinder von Asuryan an, aber mein Volk soll dann schuld an der Tragödie sein, die sie ihrer Taten wegen ereilt hat?" {n}Yrliet ist außer sich vor Verachtung und Rage.{/n} "Nein, mein Volk würde nicht willentlich an einem von den Dunklen verübten Massaker teilnehmen und dann sein Schiff verlassen. Hier muss etwas anderes geschehen sein, aber ich fürchte mich, darüber nachzudenken, was das sein könnte."
languages.original_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

Menschen greifen ein friedlich vorbeifliegendes Schiff der Kinder von Asuryan an, aber mein Volk soll dann schuld an der Tragödie sein, die sie ihrer Taten wegen ereilt hat?" {n}Yrliet ist außer sich vor Verachtung und Rage.{/n} "Nein, mein Volk würde nicht willentlich an einem von den Dunklen verübten Massaker teilnehmen und dann sein Schiff verlassen. Hier muss etwas anderes geschehen sein, aber ich fürchte mich, darüber nachzudenken, was das sein könnte."

languages.text: «Qué ciegos están los mon-keigh ante la inmoralidad de su propia gente. ¿Los humanos atacan una nave de los hijos de Asuryan que volaba sin más, pero culpan a los míos de una tragedia producida por sus actos?». {n}Yrliet está fuera de sí, cargada de desprecio y rabia.{/n} «No, mis hermanos no participarían en una masacre orquestada por los Oscuros por su propia voluntad para luego abandonar su nave. Creo que ocurrió algo más aquí, algo que me aterra siquiera considerar».
languages.original_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

traits.locale_text: «Qué ciegos están los mon-keigh ante la inmoralidad de su propia gente. ¿Los humanos atacan una nave de los hijos de Asuryan que volaba sin más, pero culpan a los míos de una tragedia producida por sus actos?». {n}Yrliet está fuera de sí, cargada de desprecio y rabia.{/n} «No, mis hermanos no participarían en una masacre orquestada por los Oscuros por su propia voluntad para luego abandonar su nave. Creo que ocurrió algo más aquí, algo que me aterra siquiera considerar».

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは自分たちの種族の悪徳に対してなんと盲目なのだろう。人間たちは平和に航行するアシュリアンの御子らの船を襲うが、その行いのために彼らに降りかかった悲劇を責められるべきなのは、我が同族の者たちなのか？」{n}ユリエットは軽蔑と怒りで我を忘れている。{/n}「いや、同族は自らの意志で暗黒の者たちを虐殺し、船を見捨てるようなことはしない。考えるのも恐ろしいような、何か別のことが起こったのだ」
languages.original_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは自分たちの種族の悪徳に対してなんと盲目なのだろう。人間たちは平和に航行するアシュリアンの御子らの船を襲うが、その行いのために彼らに降りかかった悲劇を責められるべきなのは、我が同族の者たちなのか？」{n}ユリエットは軽蔑と怒りで我を忘れている。{/n}「いや、同族は自らの意志で暗黒の者たちを虐殺し、船を見捨てるようなことはしない。考えるのも恐ろしいような、何か別のことが起こったのだ」

languages.text: "Mon-keighler, soydaşlarının suçlarını ne de kolay göz ardı ediyor. Asuryan'ın Çocukları kendi yollarında güzelce giderken insanların saldırısına uğramış ama suç soydaşlarımın, öyle mi? Ettiklerini bulmuşlar işte." {n}Yrliet, öfkeden küplere biniyor.{/n} "Hayır, soydaşlarım Karalar'ın başını çektiği bir katliama alet olup da gemilerini terk etmez. Burada başka bir şey olmuş. İhtimalini bile düşünmekten korktuğum bir şey."
languages.original_text: "How blind are the mon-keigh to the vices of their own kind. Humans attack a ship of the Children of Asuryan sailing peacefully by, but it is my kinspeople who are to blame for the tragedy that befell them for their deeds?" {n}Yrliet is beside herself with contempt and rage.{/n} "No, my kind would not willingly take part in a massacre orchestrated by the Dark Ones and then abandon their ship. Something else happened here, something I am afraid to even consider."
